features.name: Real-time Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard displaying KPIs, waiting times, and fleet performance metrics for FENI dump sites

features.name: Waiting Time Calculation Engine
features.description: Core M/M/1 queuing theory algorithms to calculate realistic waiting times at dump sites using utilization-based approach

features.name: Individual Dump Location Analysis
features.description: Calculates waiting times and utilization for specific individual dump locations within FENI KM0 and KM15

features.name: Departure Time Optimization
features.description: Optimization algorithm to find best departure times from parking locations to minimize dump site waiting times

features.name: Fleet Configuration Management
features.description: System to configure contractors, truck counts, routes, and dump site assignments

features.name: Excel Data Integration
features.description: Loads and processes Time_Data.xlsx with real operational data for cycle times and travel times

features.name: FENI Dump Site Management
features.description: Hierarchical management of FENI KM0 and KM15 dump sites with individual sub-locations and service rates

features.name: Service Rate Configuration
features.description: Defines service rates for dump sites: FENI KM0 (8.5 trucks/hour), FENI KM15 (11.0 trucks/hour) based on real data

features.name: Utilization-Based Wait Calculation
features.description: Uses rho (utilization factor) = arrival_rate / service_rate to determine waiting times with thresholds: rho>=0.9 (34.8 min), rho>=0.7 (25 min), else M/M/1 formula

features.name: Real Truck Journey Simulation
features.description: Simulates individual truck journeys from parking to loading to dumping with realistic travel times and congestion factors
